jam.fit
Class PeakIntensity

java.lang.Object
  jam.fit.Fit
      jam.fit.PeakIntensity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, PlotMouseListener
public class PeakIntensity
extends Fit

Takes 4 channels as input...limits of background, and limits of peak. Returns a background level and peak intensity.

Version:
28 July 2002
Author:
Dale Visser, Carrie Rowland

Method Detail

estimate

public void estimate()
Description copied from class: Fit
Changes parameter values to calculated estimates. Useful for NonLinearFit, which requires reasonably close guesses in order to converge on a good chi-squared minimum.

Specified by:
estimate in class Fit
See Also:
NonLinearFit, GaussianFit.estimate()

public double calculate(int channel)
Description copied from class: Fit
Calculates function value for a specific channel. Uses whatever the current values are for the parameters in parameters.

Parameters:
